data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aquino, Daniel Alejandro, Tavares, Marcelo Texeira, Balducci, Ezequiel, Baca, Verónica, Quinteros, Sara Quintana De (2015): The microlepidopterous natural enemy Brachymeria subrugosa Blanchard, 1942 (Hymenoptera, Chalcididae): identity, hosts and geographic distribution. Zootaxa 4013 (2): 293-300, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4013.2.10
